content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

Tuesday May 13, 2025 

Today is a “A” Day 

  • It’s time for some Bucks by the Boatload! Teachers – please have your LiveSchool accounts ready! Today we will award 25 Blue Streak Bucks to each student who has their laptop. That’s right, 25 bucks! Remember that it is your responsibility to bring your charged laptop to school each day. Keep following the 4 B’s to earn more Bucks by the Boatload! 

 

  •  Today’s lunch is walking tacos with all the yummy fixings 

 

Be Safe, Be Respectful, Be responsible and Be KIND.  

 As Always, make it a great day or not… the choice is yours.
